title: Komoda font
content:
Komoda is a display, sans serif typeface suitable for headlines, editorial and poster design. This font is free for personal and commercial use.

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092741im_/http:/cdn.fontm.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Komoda-font.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092741/http:/fontm.com/komoda-font/)

[Download](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092741/http:/fontm.com/komoda-font/)
author: socialh

comments.content:
Hey there,

I never was a big fan of unicase fonts but in this case it looks good. You did a fine job with this.
